newsitem.title: MACEDONIA: MACEDONIA STOCK VOLUME, TURNOVER RISE.
newsitem.headline: MACEDONIA STOCK VOLUME, TURNOVER RISE.

text.p: Turnover and traded volume rose at Tuesday's session of the Macedonian Stock Exchange, the exchange said.
Total turnover grew to 2.472 million denars from 5,592 denars with 285 shares changing hands, up from three units at the previous session on Thursday.
Gradski Targovski Centar AD sold 143 shares at 1,864 denars each on the first floor, unchanged from Thursday's close and below par of 2,663 denars.
A total of 140 Oteks AD shares traded on the third floor at 150 denars, down 50 from Thursday and well below par of 1,941.
Kreditna banka AD Skopje sold two shares at 1.092 million denars each, unchanged from Thursday but above par of 120,000.

Listed companies trade in two floor sessions. Unlisted ones, mostly firms offered for privatisation, trade in a third floor session. The exchange trades twice a week. ($1=40.30 denars; 1DEM=26.63 denars) -- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-981 4145
